paper_abstract: SQL is a ubiquitous language used in a wide range of applications for accessing the data stored in relational databases. However, the usual software testing techniques are not designed to address some important features of SQL. We present a set of practical guidelines for designing white-box tests cases that reasonably exercise the way in which an SQL query processes the stored data. These guidelines are illustrated using an example.
paper_title: A practical guide to SQL white-box testing
